python: hi guys, after upgrading my ubuntu to 9.04 my $PYTHONPATH got broken and I have to do "export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.5/site-packages/" every time I restart my computer, how do I fix that ?
Jaunty uses 2.6 now, but if you want to make that change perminent, just add the entire command to your ~/.bashrc
You'll have to reboot for it to take effect
